text:
Our time together is nearly done
We've laughed a lot and we've had such fun!

But don't be sad, we'll still be here
To sing and to play next time you're near.

So Farewell from The Zorbits its time to go
And the message from Gecko is cheerio

Now it's Goodbye from Number Zoo
We've got so much to do
So go out and play, do something ace,

Build a den or have a snail race!
because out there's a world that's fun
There's so much to do in the rain or sun.

You could colour a frog or make a chocolate
log

Sail the seven seas or fly to planet Zog,
You can dress up and play hide and seek,
Make a noise, like you have a beak! (squawk)

So Turn off the power and run around
Or go and build a tower, up from the ground

paint a red crab, draw a funny face.
Pretend your floating in outer space
Switch off your big screen, and turn away

Get out your toys and just play play play
So girls and boys,Â we'll see you very soon
It's time to finish this tune.
Goodbye, Farewell it's time to go!

Adios! Ciao and toodle oo!
See you next time! Have a great day
Its good to turn off and play
